snippet: When the Denver Broncos first took the field as charter members of the fledgling American Football League in 1960, the rag-tag team's mustard-yellow jerseys, chocolate brown pants and vertically-striped socks were a source of derision....
lead_paragraph: When the Denver Broncos first took the field as charter members of the fledgling American Football League in 1960, the rag-tag team's mustard-yellow jerseys, chocolate brown pants and vertically-striped socks were a source of derision.

headline.main: Broncos Eye Third Super Bowl Win to Enhance Bowlen's Legacy
headline.print_headline: Broncos Eye Third Super Bowl Win to Enhance Bowlen's Legacy
